venue.address_1: 212 Hampshire St., 212 Hampshire St., Inman Sq., Cambridge
venue.name: Ryles Jazz Club

item.description:
Calling all the salsa holics and soon to be! Ready for another meetup event? Well we are! We will be hanging out at Wepa Sundays this November 12th with the meetup crew and more! Everyone, newcomers and advanced, are welcome!

We will have a few tables reserved, and there will be meetup game mixers and prizes.

No need to bring anything except your energy! Discount at the door for meetup members who have RSVP'd! Only $8 entrance.

Also, don't forget to post your picture so you can spot each other on the dance floor.

DETAILS:

Salsa Lesson + $5 Dinner Buffet + Salsa Dance
Enjoy an early evening of Salsa music, dance, and food in the company of friends and friends yet to be made. Take in a Salsa and Merengue lesson at 6. Enjoy a buffet dinner starting at 7 (YUM!). Dance to the best Salsa, Merengue, and Cha Cha music from 7 to 11 pm. Admission is $10 and includes the lesson. Dinner buffet is only $5 per plate! It's 18+ and there's lots of free parking

* 6-7pm Salsa Class for all levels with AprilOn2
* 7-8pm Dinner buffet catered from the S&S restaurant
* 7-11pm DJ Rob & visting DJs spinning the best Salsa, merengue, bachata and more
* Enjoy great food, drinks, music, and friends to be made at Ryles


Look forward to seeing you guys there!

Ana :)

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: NOVEMBER MEETUP EVENT!
